title: Da f*ck just happened to my MMR?
body:
So I'm in B3 18lp atm. Just the other day I was getting rougly 28-33 lp per win and I only lost around 12-ish per loss. That was when I was in high lp B4 and all the way into my promos.

All of a sudden, I get into B3, play one bad game on Syndra and one bad game on Thresh and I'm only getting 18lp per win? wot.

replies.body: you are 3-7 in your last 10... thats where your MMR went...
So if I go on another winning streak does the MMR rise up again? And yeah both if the last patches stuffed my Mid lane pool up a little
